UIDictionary.GameOverVictory: The Invasion was Stopped and the Outer Wilds are Saved!

DialogueDictionary.GENERAL_INTRO_1_1: About damn time you showed up, cadet! Abandoning your duty as a Solar Ranger? The invaders will be launching an attack any minute now!
DialogueDictionary.GENERAL_INTRO_1_CHOICE_1: Cadet? You must be mistaken, I'm not--
DialogueDictionary.GENERAL_INTRO_2_1: What was that, cadet? Are you questioning your superior officer?
DialogueDictionary.GENERAL_INTRO_3_1: Good! Now then, let's get you briefed on the situation.
DialogueDictionary.GENERAL_RANGERS_1: You hit your head out there, cadet?
DialogueDictionary.GENERAL_RANGERS_2: The Solar Rangers are the last bastion of freedom and justice in the outer wilds!
DialogueDictionary.GENERAL_RANGERS_3: Using our superior technology and firepower, we defend settlers and other peaceful folk from the dangers lurking in deep space.
DialogueDictionary.GENERAL_INVADERS_1: That's right! An invasion! The nefarious Eggmund Empire is preparing to conquer this solar system!
DialogueDictionary.GENERAL_INVADERS_2: See that unsightly planetoid beneath us? That's one of their dastardly Egg Star battlestations!
DialogueDictionary.GENERAL_INVADERS_3: Using fractal hyperdimensional spacetime folding, they've packed an entire armada of attack ships inside, just waiting to strike!
DialogueDictionary.GENERAL_INVADERS_4: To keep the community of the outer wilds safe, we must repel these invaders!
DialogueDictionary.GENERAL_ORDERS_1: Due to... unplanned circumstances, you're our only spaceworthy ranger, so it's all up to you, cadet!
DialogueDictionary.GENERAL_ORDERS_2: First, you'll need to destroy all of the reinforcement beacons on the outside of the Egg Star.
DialogueDictionary.GENERAL_ORDERS_3: Some of those beacons will be shielded, so you'll need to use your laserscope or scout-grenade to take them out on foot.
DialogueDictionary.GENERAL_ORDERS_4: That should force the main hatch to open up, allowing you to make your way into the vulnerable interior and reach the reactor core.
DialogueDictionary.GENERAL_ORDERS_5: Once you've found it, blow that reactor core sky high and get the hell out of there!
DialogueDictionary.GENERAL_INVASION_2: Sweet mother of stars, they're here!
DialogueDictionary.GENERAL_INVASION_3: Now get to your ship, cadet! We've just outfitted it with the latest armaments! Go take down those eggheads!
DialogueDictionary.GENERAL_EXIT_1: Good! Now get to your ship, cadet! That's an order!
DialogueDictionary.NOMAI_ENTRY_2: Don't worry about your ship, we'll get your weaponry fixed up for you!
DialogueDictionary.NOMAI_ENTRY_3: Let's defend the folks of the Outer Wilds together, okay?
DialogueDictionary.OWLK_ENTRY_1: The Solar Rangers help out the community, so we do what we can in return.
DialogueDictionary.OWLK_ENTRY_2: That's why I decided to sign up and become a Ranger myself.
DialogueDictionary.OWLK_ENTRY_3: You should speak with the General. He's got a plan to deal with this invasion.
